author: giffels
body:
Hi,

this new DBS release 3.1.8c contains Lexicon fixes for user lfns and processed dataset names for CRAB 2 publication. Could you build rpms and deploy them to cmsweb-testbed only, please?

Thanks,
Manuel
title: comp.pre slc5_amd64_gcc461 dbs3 dbs3-client dbs3-migration dbs3-pycurl-client
